Articles.Content:
I\'ve seen the flood of various real life jets threads and why not just have a sort of repository for them like we had for the Kerbalized rockets?

Anyway here are my creations:

**F-4 Phantom:**

Real life

> 
> ![800px-F-4B_VF-111_dropping_bombs_on_Vietnam.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c0/F-4B_VF-111_dropping_bombs_on_Vietnam.jpg/800px-F-4B_VF-111_dropping_bombs_on_Vietnam.jpg)
> 
> ![f4_07.jpg](http://www.aerospaceweb.org/aircraft/fighter/f4/f4_07.jpg)
> 
>

I did, and my design climbed faster than anything else, but turning was so slow.
